Package gui.form.base

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChangeListener
    Interface for listening to changes
    ChangeSubject
    Interface for offering services to listen for changes
    Displayable
    Interface for displaying a textual representation of an object to put in a ListBox
    FormContainer<T extends Form>
    Container of a Form
    FormObjectChild
    Interface for children of a FormObject
    FormObjectWithChildren
    Interface for FormObjects that have children
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Button
    Button that can be added to a Form
    ButtonState
    Indicates the state of a Button
    CheckBox
    TextBox that can be added to a Form
    CheckBoxState
    Indicates the state of a CheckBox
    Constants
    Useful constants
    DropDownMenu<T extends Displayable>
    A class of DropDownMenus, extending a listbox, but being able to be disabled.
    DropDownMenuState
    An abstract class representing whether a DropDownMenu is Enabled or Disabled.
    Form
    Form in which FormObjects can be placed.
    FormObject
    Object that can be added to a Form.
    InputBox
    InputBox that can be added to a Form.
    InputBoxState
    Indicates the state of an InputBox.
    Label
    Label that can be added to a Form.
    ListBox<T extends Displayable>
    A class that represents a ListBox in which ListBoxItems exist
    MenuBar
    A class that represents a menu bar on which clickable menuHeaders reside.
    MenuHeader
    A class that represents a Header in a MenuBar
    MenuItem
    A class representing a MenuItem in a drop down menu of a MenuHeader
    MenuItemState
    Indicates the state of a MenuItem
    RadioButton
    RadioButton that can be added to a Form
    RadioButtonGroup
    A class of RadioButtonGroups, keeping track of the selected RadioButton
    RadioButtonState
    Indicates the state of a RadioButton
    State
    Indicates the state
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FormObject.LabelPosition
    Enumeration of possible label positions.
